ingredients.item: 1 pack essential Waitrose Peppered Smoked Mackerel Fillets

instructions.step: Remove the skin and any bones from the mackerel and place in a food processor with the yogurt and horseradish sauce, pulse to give a coarse paste.
Season and stir in the chives and capers.
Toast or griddle essential Waitrose Wholemeal Pittas, cut into strips and serve hot with the pâté.
